#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Application.

= Description =

The [Application] element is used by individual applications to store application specific data and extensions.

= Attributes =

 # name - Application name. Mandatory.
 # display-name - Application Display Name in English language. Mandatory.
 # version - Application version. Optional.

= Elements = 

Any.

Will be ignored by other applications.

Must maintain GolfML Document Specification.

= Notes =

The Application Structure is offered to those applications that want to use a single GolfML Document for data storage.

= See Also =

Parent element: [Applications]
